Name: Surviving West
About the game: SURVIVING WEST Surviving West takes you to a beautiful world with many things to do and locations to discover. A peaceful and calm start with focus on building and surviving. When you are ready you can explore the world and find its treasures. In Surviving West you decide.. but be prepared for everything. Core features and game mechanics in Surviving West Patch v1.0 Modular Building Be creative while building using one of the multiple building materials available. Wild animals and enemies Scattered around the world you will find wild animals. Kill them for food and the potential of loot. But beware of other enemies lurking around. Farming Ensure you never run out of food by planting and farming your own food supply. Single and Multiplayer Support You can decide if you want to play with friends or solo. You can even start a public server for others to join. Character needs Your character needs food and water to stay alive. Different food contains different nutrients. It's vital that you keep your Protein, Carbs, Fat and Vitamin levels high.
